job_details.Functieomschrijving:
The Generative Models team is part of the AI Product Line at HubSpot and partners closely with the Generative AI Platform team to deliver the next generation of internally trained and fine-tuned Large Language Models., * Design and develop machine learning models and tooling for pre-training and/or fine-tuning open source large language models.
     * Experience with the modern LLM stack incl. Retrieval augmented generation, parameter efficient fine-tuning, LoRA, etc.
     * Implement and deploy machine learning algorithms in a scalable and efficient manner, working closely with software engineers
     * Collaborate with product managers to define and refine requirements and use cases for conversation intelligence.
     * Analyze and preprocess data from a variety of sources including numeric, text and other mediums
     * Conduct experiments and evaluations of machine learning models, using statistical methods and visualization tools to assess performance and identify areas for improvement
     * Keep up to date with the latest research and trends in Generative AI, and contribute to the development of new algorithms and techniques
     * Participate in code reviews, testing, and documentation activities, ensuring high quality and maintainability of the codebase
     * Experience or interest in mentoring other team members and proactively sharing knowledge
job_details.full_text:
Sr. Machine Learning Engineer II

The Generative Models team is part of the AI Product Line at HubSpot and partners closely with the Generative AI Platform team to deliver the next generation of internally trained and fine-tuned Large Language Models., * Design and develop machine learning models and tooling for pre-training and/or fine-tuning open source large language models.
     * Experience with the modern LLM stack incl. Retrieval augmented generation, parameter efficient fine-tuning, LoRA, etc.
     * Implement and deploy machine learning algorithms in a scalable and efficient manner, working closely with software engineers
     * Collaborate with product managers to define and refine requirements and use cases for conversation intelligence.
     * Analyze and preprocess data from a variety of sources including numeric, text and other mediums
     * Conduct experiments and evaluations of machine learning models, using statistical methods and visualization tools to assess performance and identify areas for improvement
     * Keep up to date with the latest research and trends in Generative AI, and contribute to the development of new algorithms and techniques
     * Participate in code reviews, testing, and documentation activities, ensuring high quality and maintainability of the codebase
     * Experience or interest in mentoring other team members and proactively sharing knowledge

profile_classification.rationale: The job description heavily emphasizes the development, fine-tuning, and deployment of Large Language Models (LLMs) using generative techniques like Retrieval Augmented Generation (RAG) and Parameter-Efficient Fine-Tuning (PEFT). It also mentions building tooling for these models and working closely with software engineers to implement and deploy ML algorithms in a scalable manner, aligning directly with the core responsibilities and evidence profile of a GenAI Engineer.

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'Design and develop machine learning models and tooling for pre-training and/or fine-tuning open source large language models' directly relates to the creation and adaptation of models.
job_tasks.phrase: Design and develop machine learning models and tooling for pre-training and/or fine-tuning open source large language models

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'Experience with the modern LLM stack incl. Retrieval augmented generation, parameter efficient fine-tuning, LoRA, etc.' describes specific techniques used in model adaptation and generation.
job_tasks.phrase: Experience with the modern LLM stack incl. Retrieval augmented generation, parameter efficient fine-tuning, LoRA, etc.

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'Implement and deploy machine learning algorithms in a scalable and efficient manner, working closely with software engineers' indicates the integration of ML models into larger software systems and deployment aspects.
job_tasks.phrase: Implement and deploy machine learning algorithms in a scalable and efficient manner, working closely with software engineers

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'Collaborate with product managers to define and refine requirements and use cases for conversation intelligence' shows an understanding of business needs and translating them into technical requirements.
job_tasks.phrase: Collaborate with product managers to define and refine requirements and use cases for conversation intelligence

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'Analyze and preprocess data from a variety of sources including numeric, text and other mediums' describes the necessary steps for preparing data for model training.
job_tasks.phrase: Analyze and preprocess data from a variety of sources including numeric, text and other mediums

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'Conduct experiments and evaluations of machine learning models, using statistical methods and visualization tools to assess performance and identify areas for improvement' is a core part of the model development lifecycle.
job_tasks.phrase: Conduct experiments and evaluations of machine learning models, using statistical methods and visualization tools to assess performance and identify areas for improvement

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'Keep up to date with the latest research and trends in Generative AI, and contribute to the development of new algorithms and techniques' implies continuous learning and application of new data processing and modeling techniques.
job_tasks.phrase: Keep up to date with the latest research and trends in Generative AI, and contribute to the development of new algorithms and techniques

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'Participate in code reviews, testing, and documentation activities, ensuring high quality and maintainability of the codebase' are standard software development practices for ensuring code quality.
job_tasks.phrase: Participate in code reviews, testing, and documentation activities, ensuring high quality and maintainability of the codebase

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'Experience or interest in mentoring other team members and proactively sharing knowledge' indicates a willingness to learn and teach, which is a form of adaptability and knowledge sharing.
job_tasks.phrase: Experience or interest in mentoring other team members and proactively sharing knowledge

mentoring other team members and proactively sharing knowledge
